## ICollector interface

Collects [ICollectible](./ts-utils.collections.icollectible.md) items. Items in a collector are created by key and are assigned an index at the time of addition. Items are immutable once added.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ICollector<TKEY extends string = string, TINDEX extends number = number, TITEM extends ICollectible<TKEY, TINDEX> = ICollectible<TKEY, TINDEX>, TSRC = TITEM> extends IReadOnlyCollector<TKEY, TINDEX, TITEM> 
```
**Extends:** [IReadOnlyCollector](./ts-utils.collections.ireadonlycollector.md)<!-- -->&lt;TKEY, TINDEX, TITEM&gt;

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[add(key, item)](./ts-utils.icollector.add.md)


</td><td>

Adds an item to the collector using the default [factory](./ts-utils.collections.collectiblefactory.md) at a specified key, failing if an item with that key already exists.


</td></tr>

[addItem(item)](./ts-utils.icollector.additem.md)


</td><td>

Adds an item to the collector using the default [factory](./ts-utils.collections.collectiblefactory.md) at a specified key, failing if an item with that key already exists.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getOrAdd(key, item)](./ts-utils.icollector.getoradd.md)


</td><td>

Gets an item by key if it exists, or creates a new item and adds it using the default [factory](./ts-utils.collections.collectiblefactory.md) if not.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getOrAdd(key, callback)](./ts-utils.icollector.getoradd_1.md)


</td><td>

Gets an item by key if it exists, or creates a new item and adds it using the specified [factory callback](./ts-utils.collections.collectiblefactorycallback.md) if not.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getOrAddItem(item)](./ts-utils.icollector.getoradditem.md)


</td><td>

Gets an existing item with a key matching that of a supplied item, or adds the supplied item to the collector if no item with that key exists.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[toReadOnly()](./ts-utils.icollector.toreadonly.md)


</td><td>

Gets a [read-only map](./ts-utils.ireadonlyresultmap.md) which can access the items in the collector.


</td></tr>
